name: 鄭有進
objective: 透過原理解說與系統實作，使學生熟悉物件導向設計原理及C++進階程式設計技術，內容含：1. C++ 物件模型 2. 類別與物件3. 建構者與解構者 4. 繼承 5. 虛擬函式與多型 6. 運算子溢載 7. 例外處理 8. 泛型程式設計 9. 標準模板程式庫 10. 期末專題設計
schedule:
01 介紹 C++ 開發環境與作業繳交方式; Unit testing with GoogleTest
02 How to solve it - Example: applying how to solve it (math vector in C)
03 Inner product round 1/Inner product round 2
04 Inner product, round 3
05 handling I/O 
06 Inner product, round 4: refactoring into object
07 special member functions: default constructor, copy constructor, 
     destructor shallow copy, deep copy
08 Convex polygon
09 Midterm;
    special member functions: copy assignment operator overloading; 
    return a reference to data member; encapsulation and delegation: 
    How do ConvexPolygon and Vector collaborate?
10 How To Solve It: Delegation from ConvexPolygon to Vector Sorting 
    Vectors with STL sort
11 Sorting Vertices of  a convex polygon; 
     Simple Factory vs constructor for convex polygon
12 Polymorphism 
     Design: Overloading vs. overriding vs. template
13 Programming with STL
14 Programming with STL
15 file i/o 
16 Matrix and linear transformation
17 Platform independence 
     Introduction to Scrum
18 Final Exam
